title: Ayawaso East seat: NDC clears Baba Jamal to contest
desc: The National Democratic Congress (NDC) has confirmed Baba Jamal Mohammed Ahmed, popularly known as Baba Jamal, as its candidate for the Ayawaso East parliamentary by-election after deciding that annulment of the internal parliamentary primary was not an option

title: ‘We’ll Have to Use Carrier Pigeons’: Russian Troops in Chaos as Telegram, Starlink Cut Off
